*Infectra continues walking now getting more bored. She sighs and bites the=
 cookie*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 11:58 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


  Arrow smiles and turns back to Stranato. Stranato groans and continu=
es walking...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
=
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:45 PM
    Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra smiles at Arrow and takes a cooki=
e* Infectra: Thank you. *Infectra says to Arrow*
      ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Fr=
iday, July 14, 2000 10:31 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Airb=
omber smils.

      "So, where are we going?" Train Wreck asks, his eyes cr=
ossing. He hit himself in the head and his optics straightened out.

      =
"We go to join another group, be it Newcomers, Predacons with Hell Beast, P=
redacons with Megatron, are Alliance." Stranato said.

      "Yeah, but we =
don't know where Megatron's team are!" Blender put in. Stronghold stared ah=
ead, thinking about which team would be best to join.

      "Anyone for a =
cookie?" Arrow asked.

      "You made those?" Stronghold asked.

      "Ye=
s, I did!" Arrow said.

      "What a wuss, ah yes, what are they made of? =
Ah screw it just give me one, as long as you'll shut up!" Stronghold said, =
he grabbed one and Arrow chuckled with delight. Blender sighed and shook hi=
s head. Airbomber laughed but then Arrow turned around in his walk and look=
ed at him. Airbomber sighed and took a cookie. He did a fake chuckle. Arrow=
 looked at Infectra and smiled...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
     From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: F=
riday, July 14, 2000 10:06 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


       =
 Infectra: Sure, I'll come with you. *Infectra says to The Radicons as she =
continues to follow them*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
 From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, J=
uly 14, 2000 9:25 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Airb=
omber looks back at Infectra and smiles.

          "We're leaving the Maxi=
mals, they are full of themselves are stupid, we don't want to be with the =
likes of them, won't you come with us, Infectra?" Airbomber pleaded.

     =
     "If you don't then I pity you, of course." Stranato said...
          =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
        =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 7:48 PM=

            Subject: Neo Beast Wars


            *Infectra looks around a=
s she follows The Radicons hoping that they would find some excitment*
